name: talks-damonoehlman
description: If I'm talking about anything (presenting), then the content probably ends up here

scripts.start: rm -rf bundle.js && npm run-script gendocs && beefy index.js:bundle.js -- -t brfs
scripts.bundle: rm -rf bundle.js && gendocs > README.md && browserify index -t brfs > bundle.js

author: Damon Oehlman <damon.oehlman@gmail.com>
